conversations.content: How many parks are there in Phoenix, Arizona?

Phoenix is home to more than 180 parks, offering a wide range of amenities and recreational opportunities. [oai_citation_attribution:5‡City of Phoenix](https://www.phoenix.gov/parks/parks/alphabetical?utm_source=chatgpt.com)
What is the largest municipal park in Phoenix?

South Mountain Park, spanning over 16,500 acres, is the largest municipal park in Phoenix and one of the largest in the world. [oai_citation_attribution:4‡Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phoenix%2C_Arizona?utm_source=chatgpt.com)
Can you name a park in Phoenix known for its hiking trails?

Camelback Mountain is renowned for its hiking trails, offering challenging routes and panoramic views of the city. [oai_citation_attribution:3‡Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phoenix%2C_Arizona?utm_source=chatgpt.com)
Which park in Phoenix houses the Desert Botanical Garden?

Papago Park is home to the Desert Botanical Garden, showcasing desert plant life from around the world. [oai_citation_attribution:2‡Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phoenix%2C_Arizona?utm_source=chatgpt.com)
Where can I find the Phoenix Zoo?
The Phoenix Zoo is located within Papago Park in east Phoenix. [oai_citation_attribution:1‡Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phoenix%2C_Arizona?utm_source=chatgpt.com)
